Class BuildingManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • BuildingManager
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    BuildingManagerInterface

    public class BuildingManager
extends java.lang.Object
implements BuildingManagerInterface
    This class is a data structure to manage various Building objects The objects are managed in an ArrayList
    Author:
    Adam Holt
